thread.title: Disney Visa® Cardmembers: Soak Up the Savings at Aulani
thread.title_full: Disney Visa® Cardmembers: Soak Up the Savings at Aulani

author: Off to Neverland Travel
title: Disney Visa® Cardmembers: Soak Up the Savings at Aulani
text:
Request a Quote Disney Visa® Cardmembers: Soak Up the Savings at Aulani Get ready to soak up the savings at Aulani , a Disney Resort & Spa in Ko Olina, Hawai‘i! 
Inspired by the wonders of Hawai‘i and built with the perfect touch of Disney magic, Aulani is a beautiful beachfront escape that’s designed for families. Named the “Best Family Hotel in the US” by Travel + Leisure World’s Best Awards in 2014, Aulani is a resort like no other. Here’s your chance to ‘sea’ what all the talk is about: 
For a limited time, the longer Disney Visa® Cardmembers stay, the more they save! Save 30% off stays of 5 consecutive nights or more* or 25% off a 4 night stay.* And if you book before Sep. 28, you’ll receive one complimentary meal per person per night stay at the Ulu Café ! 
Booking Window: Book now – Feb. 8, 2016 
Travel Window: Jan. 4 – Mar. 17, 2016 Contact your Magic Maker® today for more details! 
*Save 25% offer for stays of four (4) consecutive nights. Save 30% offer for stays of five (5) or more consecutive nights. All stays must be booked between now and 2/8/16, inclusive, with all nights between 1/4/16 and 3/17/15, inclusive. The number of rooms allocated for this offer is limited, and room availability may vary by dates of stay. Savings based on the non-discounted price of the same room. Savings excludes Resort fees and taxes. Offer excludes suites and 3-bedroom Grand Villas. Limit two (2) rooms per reservation and subject to room occupancy limitations. Additional per-adult charges may apply if more than 2 adults per room. Advance reservations required. Subject to additional restrictions and change without notice. Package booked before Sep. 28, 2015 includes one (1) daily meal (breakfast, lunch, or dinner) for all guests (ages 3+) booked per room per night of your package stay. Meal is only redeemable at ‘Ulu Cafe during normal operating hours and includes one (1) entree and one (1) non-specialty beverage. Meal entitlements may not be redeemed for cash in whole or in part, sold separately, transferred or refunded. All entitlements will expire at midnight on package departure date.
